the more you exhale allowing these

good

every soul incarnated in a physical body

Every Soul incarnated on the earth in
your current reality and previous

that every being upon the Earth knows
what love is they hold love within their
being even if it is only a small amount
and if they choose to they can connect

in a world where it feels that
negativity chaos or harm is greater than
love this realization is immensely
important yes we can probably say the

however love is immensely empowering
immensely powerful and so as we realize
that every generation has experienced

all generations and that the Creator is

State the following out loud
my purpose is to share my love and
